portfolio.title: Jean's Blog
portfolio.description: using the MVC architecture with the Node.js framework - Express for the backend. I'm utilizing the Sequelize ORM for the MySQL database, and I'm incorporating the CKEditor 5 editor from a CDN to add and edit articles.e

portfolio.title: PHP Board
portfolio.description: Write the backend in PHP, use a MySQL relational database to link users and message content, create a login functionality using sessions, and, using the GET method, add errCode to the query string for backend error message notifications

portfolio.title: React ToDoList
portfolio.description: Build an environment using 'my-react-app' to create a to-do list with functional components. Learn how to use hooks such as 'useState'
